程序包 org.group4

类 CombatSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.group4.CombatSystem
  • public class CombatSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aims to create a combat system. It simulates a combat situation, where user can command his/her spaceship to fight against the enemy.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器

      CombatSystem()

    • 方法详细资料

      • combat

        public java.lang.String combat()
                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                               javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                               javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Start the combat
        返回:
        the result of the combat win or lose
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if current thread is block or interrupt, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the voice can not play, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if the current line is unavailable, it will throw an exception
        java.io.IOException - if there exist input and output problem, program will throw an exception

      • attackEnemy

        public void attackEnemy​(int attackNum,
                        double enemyStatus,
                        int enemyNum,
                        double rate)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Main character attack
        参数:
        attackNum - the attack value
        enemyStatus - enemy status defend or status
        enemyNum - enemy attack or defend value
        rate - probability
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if current thread is block or interrupt, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the voice can not play, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if the current line is unavailable, it will throw an exception
        java.io.IOException - if there exist input and output problem, program will throw an exception

      • setMainCharAttack

        public void setMainCharAttack​(int attackNum,
                              double rate)
        Set main character attack number and check whether critical attack happens
        参数:
        attackNum - the attack value
        rate - probability of critical attack

      • setEnemyValue

        public void setEnemyValue​(double status,
                          int enemyNum,
                          double rate)
        Set the enemy attack or defend value and check whether critical attack happens
        参数:
        status - the status of enemy (attack or defend)
        enemyNum - the enemy attack or defend number
        rate - probability of critical attack
